conventional_long_name: Republic of South Ossetia – The State of Alania
native_name: <hr/> Республикӕ Хуссар Ирыстон / Паддзахад Аллонстон (os) ++ !!{{resize | 95% | !!{{transl | os | Rêšpublika Xuššâr Irešton / Pâddzâxâd Âllonšton}} }}, <hr/> !!{{big | ცხინვალის რეგიონი}} (ka) ++ !!{{resize | 95% | !!{{transl | ka | Tskhinvalis regioni}} }}, <hr/> Республика Южная Осетия / Государство Алания (ru) ++ !!{{resize | 95% | !!{{transl | ru | Respublika Yuzhnaya Osetiya / Gosudarstvo Alaniya}} }}

map_caption: South Ossetia (green), Georgia, and Abkhazia (light grey).

national_anthem: National Anthem of South Ossetia ++ National Anthem of South Ossetia – Республикӕ Хуссар Ирыстоны Паддзахадон Гимн ++
status: Partially recognised state ++ Recognised by the United Nations as de jure part of Georgia
footnote_a: Ossetian and Russian languages are official languages[^4]

references.[^4]:
Presidential Elections in South Ossetia – Plan B
The first round of voting was accompanied by a referendum in which the Ossetians were to decide whether Russian should become the second official language of South Ossetia. Nearly 85 per cent of the voters supported the referendum.
